content: > gratitude noun the quality of being > thankful readiness to show > appreciation for and to return > kindness to celebrate 2500 likes on facebook the gratitude series will be released see here for more details 1 each design is perfect for the odd skein of yarn in the yarn stash they are quick and easy to work up perfect for gifts craft fairs or donating to charity the third pattern in the gratitude range is a wrap which takes 200g of dk yarn pictures have been added to help you get started a chart has been added as a guide pattern has been tested - thank you to kirsty vesna and clare stitches chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet v v_stitch double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in the same space use the hashtags #gratitudewrap and #buttonnosecrochet on social media so i can see your lovely finished projects *this pattern has been designed and written by natasha thorley of buttonnose crochet please do not share copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell your finished items but please give buttonnose crochet credit ©buttonnose crochet 2017* 1 https //www facebook com/groups/136064043789873/
